name: OneSchema
headline: Automate CSV imports from anywhere
description: OneSchema is the embeddable CSV importer used by product and engineering teams to save months of development time and to automate CSV mapping, validation, and transformation.
markdown:
raw_markdown='By clicking **“Accept All Cookies”** , you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. View our [Privacy Policy](https://www.oneschema.co/</privacy-notice>) for more information.
[Preferences](https://www.oneschema.co/<#>)[Deny](https://www.oneschema.co/<#>)[Accept](https://www.oneschema.co/<#>)
Privacy Preference Center
When you visit websites, they may store or retrieve data in your browser. This storage is often necessary for the basic functionality of the website. The storage may be used for marketing, analytics, and personalization of the site, such as storing your preferences. Privacy is important to us, so you have the option of disabling certain types of storage that may not be necessary for the basic functioning of the website. Blocking categories may impact your experience on the website.
[Reject all cookies](https://www.oneschema.co/<#>)[Allow all cookies](https://www.oneschema.co/<#>)
Manage Consent Preferences by Category
Essential
**Always Active**
These items are required to enable basic website functionality.
Marketing
Essential
These items are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Advertising networks usually place them with the website operator’s permission.
Personalization
Essential
These items allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. For example, a website may provide you with local weather reports or traffic news by storing data about your current location.
Analytics
Essential
These items help the website operator understand how its website performs, how visitors interact with the site, and whether there may be technical issues. This storage type usually doesn’t collect information that identifies a visitor.
[Confirm my preferences and close](https://www.oneschema.co/<#>)

Our Platform
## Support manual and recurring CSV imports
![File feed imports with status](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/665e36780852954eaeb9dc5d_embed.png)
Manual
![Embeddable Importer Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/664677875fc48264e43a2543_embeddableImporterIcon.svg)
#### Embeddable Importer
Launch one-click CSV import in minutes with a single line of code. Our powerful library of 50+ no-code validations and transformations can handle your customers’ messiest spreadsheets.
[Learn more](https://www.oneschema.co/</embeddable-importer>)
![File feed imports with status](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/66578c21006811ccd5314e8b_filefeeds.svg)
Recurring
![File Feed Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/66467f53d8cb936ecbf78ddd_fileFeedIcon.svg)
#### Embeddable FileFeeds
Unlock new customers immediately by integrating with customers’ CSV exports. Use our record and replay transformations to empower anyone to build custom integrations no-code.
[Learn more](https://www.oneschema.co/</filefeeds>)
[CustomizableCreate the ideal user experience using our 40+ customization options.](https://www.oneschema.co/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[IntelligentOur Data Normalization Engine automatically resolves common formatting errors.](https://www.oneschema.co/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[AutomateRecord and replay recurring transforms, completely no code.](https://www.oneschema.co/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/665e3677af8face837322904_Customizable.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/665e3679a7ce0bfd5fe1ba33_Intelligent.png)

“The initial setup took about a day, and we spent the rest of the week configuring the dynamic templates feature. From there to production was the flip of a switch”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/664be76ccca872490ff3600f_copyai.svg)
Patrick
Hunton
Product Lead
Our benefits
## Here's how OneSchema works as your infrastructure for CSVs
Build expressive schemas, no-code
Free the engineering team from spaghetti scripts and debugging regex. Our library of 50+ pre-built data types comes with configurable validations and intelligent transforms.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/665e3f23fe9bb6212f90693d_schemas-new.svg)
Guide your user at every step
Your customers shouldn't have to work so hard to import data.
[One-click mode](https://www.oneschema.co/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-0>)[Suggested transforms](https://www.oneschema.co/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-1>)[Customizable user education](https://www.oneschema.co/<#w-tabs-1-data-w-pane-2>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/665e38dbd297f0046ce853ab_1%20click.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/665e38db0616c141221c7b42_suggestions.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/665e38dbf9748be4bcdcaaae_education%20widget.png)
Observe, analyze, and convert
End to end observability on how your users are progressing through an import to ensure every customer has a successful import.
[Audit logs](https://www.oneschema.co/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-0>)[Funnel analysis](https://www.oneschema.co/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-1>)[Monitoring integrations](https://www.oneschema.co/<#w-tabs-2-data-w-pane-2>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/665e38db3615177b5d6c693f_audit.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/665e38dbf668a97e887400db_funnel.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/665e38dbe364a9c5a98e1944_observe.png)
"Our new users are completing the import process 50% more of the time, increasing our activation rates."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/664bf4e49a73a2e8b8745016_streak.svg)
Jasen
Kim
Head of growth

Security and compliance
## You're in good hands
Data retention policy
Configurable data retention policies, default 7 days and programmatically deletable via API.Data at rest is encrypted with AES-256 bit bank level encryption and TLS v1.2 is used while data is in transit.
Enterprise-ready compliance
OneSchema is SOC 2 Type 2, SOC 3, GDPR, CCPA and HIPAA compliant with data stored in US data centers.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/6646a2745ff4f6725a2b26ed_arrow_right.svg)](https://www.oneschema.co/</security>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/664e325c9a5587606ea165a7_complianceBadges.svg)
Flexible hosting
US, EU, CA, and AU region hosting or self hosted deployments based on AWS, GCP, and Azure.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/664e325c10977dd96895d10b_hosting.svg)
Role based access control
With fine grained access controls, only authorized users can view your schemas and import data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/66579510f979b9e5d752bd95_role%20based.svg)

' markdown_with_citations='By clicking **“Accept All Cookies”** , you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. View our Privacy Policy⟨1⟩ for more information.
Preferences⟨2⟩Deny⟨2⟩Accept⟨2⟩
Privacy Preference Center
When you visit websites, they may store or retrieve data in your browser. This storage is often necessary for the basic functionality of the website. The storage may be used for marketing, analytics, and personalization of the site, such as storing your preferences. Privacy is important to us, so you have the option of disabling certain types of storage that may not be necessary for the basic functioning of the website. Blocking categories may impact your experience on the website.
Reject all cookies⟨2⟩Allow all cookies⟨2⟩
Manage Consent Preferences by Category
Essential
**Always Active**
These items are required to enable basic website functionality.
Marketing
Essential
These items are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Advertising networks usually place them with the website operator’s permission.
Personalization
Essential
These items allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. For example, a website may provide you with local weather reports or traffic news by storing data about your current location.
Analytics
Essential
These items help the website operator understand how its website performs, how visitors interact with the site, and whether there may be technical issues. This storage type usually doesn’t collect information that identifies a visitor.
Confirm my preferences and close⟨2⟩

## Support manual and recurring CSV imports
![File feed imports with status⟨34⟩]
Manual
![Embeddable Importer Icon⟨35⟩]
#### Embeddable Importer
Launch one-click CSV import in minutes with a single line of code. Our powerful library of 50+ no-code validations and transformations can handle your customers’ messiest spreadsheets.
Learn more⟨36⟩
![File feed imports with status⟨37⟩]
Recurring
![File Feed Icon⟨38⟩]
#### Embeddable FileFeeds
Unlock new customers immediately by integrating with customers’ CSV exports. Use our record and replay transformations to empower anyone to build custom integrations no-code.
Learn more⟨39⟩

## Here's how OneSchema works as your infrastructure for CSVs
Build expressive schemas, no-code
Free the engineering team from spaghetti scripts and debugging regex. Our library of 50+ pre-built data types comes with configurable validations and intelligent transforms.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/665e3f23fe9bb6212f90693d_schemas-new.svg)
Guide your user at every step
Your customers shouldn't have to work so hard to import data.
One-click mode⟨43⟩Suggested transforms⟨44⟩Customizable user education⟨45⟩

End to end observability on how your users are progressing through an import to ensure every customer has a successful import.

Security and compliance
## You're in good hands
Data retention policy
Configurable data retention policies, default 7 days and programmatically deletable via API.Data at rest is encrypted with AES-256 bit bank level encryption and TLS v1.2 is used while data is in transit.
Enterprise-ready compliance
OneSchema is SOC 2 Type 2, SOC 3, GDPR, CCPA and HIPAA compliant with data stored in US data centers.
Learn more![⟨4⟩](https://www.oneschema.co/</security>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/664e325c9a5587606ea165a7_complianceBadges.svg)
Flexible hosting
US, EU, CA, and AU region hosting or self hosted deployments based on AWS, GCP, and Azure.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/664e325c10977dd96895d10b_hosting.svg)
Role based access control
With fine grained access controls, only authorized users can view your schemas and import data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62902d243ad8aef519be0d3e/66579510f979b9e5d752bd95_role%20based.svg)

generated_description:
**OneSchema: Simplifying CSV Imports for Developers**

Founded in 2021 and a proud member of Y Combinator's S21 batch, OneSchema is carving out a niche in the SaaS landscape by automating CSV imports. Headquartered in San Francisco, this agile team of 16 specializes in providing developer tools designed to streamline the often cumbersome task of handling CSVs.

### The Mission
OneSchema's core mission is straightforward: **Automate CSV imports from anywhere**. This mission reflects a deep understanding of the pain points faced by product and engineering teams. By offering an embeddable CSV importer, OneSchema allows these teams to save months of development time that would otherwise be spent on CSV mapping, validation, and transformation.

### What They Offer
OneSchema provides a set of powerful tools designed to enhance the user experience during data imports. Their flagship products include:
- **Embeddable Importer:** This allows companies to launch a one-click CSV import in minutes with just a line of code. The tool boasts over 50 no-code validations and transformations that assist users in handling their complex spreadsheets.
- **Embeddable FileFeeds:** This feature enables the automation of recurring CSV imports seamlessly, empowering users to record and replay transformations.

### Who Uses It?
The versatility of OneSchema makes it an invaluable tool across several industries, including:
- **Marketplaces**
- **Sustainability analytics**
- **Credit bureaus**

OneSchema is trusted by a range of customers who have reported significant improvements in onboarding conversion rates after implementing their solutions, such as Streak and Ramp.

### The Team and Support
Under the wise guidance of Group Partner Dalton Caldwell, OneSchema is energized and adaptable. Support resources like detailed documentation and customer case studies further empower teams to leverage the platform effectively.

### Industry Tags
The company is well-placed within multiple industry tags, namely:
- Developer Tools
- SaaS
- B2B
- Data Engineering
- San Francisco Bay Area

### Security and Compliance
In today's data-driven environment, safeguarding user data is paramount. OneSchema adheres to stringent compliance standards, including SOC 2 Type 2 and GDPR regulations, along with robust data encryption practices.

### Conclusion
In an era where data handling can be a bottleneck, OneSchema emerges as a beacon for efficiency and automation. By alleviating the burdens of CSV imports, they empower teams to focus on what truly matters—building great products. Interested parties can learn more and get started at [OneSchema’s website](https://www.oneschema.co).
